Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment:
"Note that the full area code is not validated - just the first 3 digits. This also
means that even though for most Austrian numbers the minimum length is 7, we allow 6
since we don't differentiate below between 3 and 4 digit area codes for reasons of
efficiency."

Label: XML_VOIP
Comment: "Convergent service numbers 780 are supported here as VOIP is closest match for such\nnumbers. All location independent corporate numbers are supported as we found these\nare dialled via IP."
